script: [DougDoug] Hi Grandma, how are you doing today?
[Example_Grandma] Oh hi DouglassDouglass, I'm doing good. How about you?
[DougDoug] I'm great now that I'm talking with you! Thanks for asking!
[Example_Grandma] Well that's wonderful dear. You always know how to brighten up my day.
[DougDoug] So what have you been up to lately?
[Example_Grandma] Oh you know, just the usual. Watching some shows, doing some reading.
[DougDoug] That sounds nice and relaxing!
[Example_Grandma] It is dear, it really is.
[DougDoug] Hey Grandma, did you see that new graphics card that came out?
[Example_Grandma] I don't think that PC will ever be back in stock, I imagine if it ever does, bots will snatch it up before a person can, heh.
[DougDoug] You're probably right about that. The bot problem is getting worse every year!
[Example_Grandma] Monitors will be cheaper around this time of year I think because new monitor models are coming out 'soon'.
[DougDoug] Oh that's a great point! I should wait a bit before upgrading then.
[Example_Grandma] Plus Samsung always has good .edu deals.
[DougDoug] Wait, you know about student discounts? That's impressive!
[Example_Grandma] If looking for a new monitor, I always check rtings.com and Monitors Unboxed on youtube.
[DougDoug] Wow Grandma, you really know your tech! I'm impressed!
[DougDoug] Hey everyone! Today we have some special guests joining us!
[Sohee] 안녕하세요! I'm so happy to be here today!
[DougDoug] And we've got someone who seems a bit worried...
[Incredulous_Panic] Wait, what? You mean I'm supposed to talk right now? This is... this is happening?
[Confident_Professional] Don't worry, you're doing great. Let's take it one step at a time.
[Sohee] Yes, we're all here to support each other!
[DougDoug] See? This is what I love about this community. Everyone helping everyone!
[Incredulous_Panic] Okay... okay, I think I can do this. Thanks everyone!
